Subject: So You Want to Write Video Games?
Description: Guest of Honor Ann Lemay and GOH Emeritus John Scalzi talk about what goes into writing the narrative stories for videogames.  Speakers include:Ann Lemay, John Scalzi - Track: Gaming  - Duration: 50 minutes

Subject: Reading/Signing: John Scalzi and Dave Klecha
Description: Join our attending authors in the Writers Block (317 & 318) for readings and signings!  Speakers include:John Scalzi, David Klecha - Track: Literature  - Duration: 50 minutes
